title: Android app download ranges worldwide 2018
summary: This statistic shows the amount spent on fresh soup in the united kingdom ( UK ) from 2007 to 2016 . In the 52 week period ending on the 2nd of 2007 , 78 million British pounds was spent on fresh soup in the UK , which had increased to 133 million British pounds in the period ending on the 30th of 2018 . There has been a declining trend in the value of soup and broths imported into the country .
gold: The chart shows the distribution of Android apps per download range as of the first quarter 2018 . As of the measured period , 21.12 percent of apps in the Google Play Store had generated 100 to 500 downloads . Only 0.1 percent of apps managed to accumulate more than five million downloads .
